review: A very powerful streaming media player compared to other devices out there including the apple TV, boot up and loading times are super fast. Nice collection of applications and streaming media. You can also side load applications to it such as XBMC. I love this box and decided to make it my primary player. I will begetting rid of my apple TV in favor of the Fire TV.
